manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Adds language support for Mirah. Includes a Mirah class file type (.mirah), with syntax highlighting, method completion, and import hints. Also adds build support so that Mirah files can be included directly inside an existing Java project with two-way dependencies between then (i.e. Java files can reference Mirah objects and vice versa).
